snippet.title: P.A.C.S - Post Apocalypse Courier Service - Steam Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Work together with up to 4 friends, Drive through treacherous terrain, Repair, upgrade and customise your trucks and deliver packages to make your Post Apocalypse Courier Service the best in the wasteland!

WISHLIST NOW!

Drive, repair, upgrade and customise your trucks to navigate desolate wastelands and deserted cities, alone or with friends.

Do you have what it takes to grow your Post Apocalypse Courier Service (P.A.C.S.) from a small-time garage operation to national mega corp., and become the best in the wasteland?

MudRunner meets Euro Truck Simulator 2 meets Mad Max reimagined as a post apocalyptic delivery driving simulator.
